feed.title: agile people management
feed.subtitle: A miscellany of real stories, ideas and thoughts about people management, project management and their interconnection in the fields of corporate human resources, digitalization, organizational and change management

entry.title: Interview: HR projects with Svetlana Ilina

link.title: Interview: HR projects with Svetlana Ilina

entry.content:
Thea Brockmeyer (CEO of RICONS Consulting GmbH, the founder of Project Leader Academy) has interviewed me and we discussed the following topics:

  1. Selection of a project management training

  2. Typical HR-projects

  3. Importance of risks analysis

  4. Behaviour and culture change projects

  5. Typical roadblocks for HR projects

  6. Tips to lead a project with success and recognition

The interview record is available online.
entry.summary: Thea Brockmeyer (CEO of RICONS Consulting GmbH, the founder of Project Leader Academy) has interviewed me and we discussed the following topics:
